thread.title: Real Madrid legend Iker Casillas slams fans for booing record goal scorer Cristiano Ronaldo
thread.title_full: Real Madrid legend Iker Casillas slams fans for booing record goal scorer Cristiano Ronaldo

author: Liam Corless
title: Real Madrid legend Iker Casillas slams fans for booing record goal scorer Cristiano Ronaldo
text:
Sport Real Madrid legend Iker Casillas slams fans for booing record goal scorer Cristiano Ronaldo Ronaldo reacted angrily on Sunday after he was targeted by supporters at the start of Madrid's win over Real Sociedad Share Cristiano Ronaldo has been jeered by Madrid's fans this season (Photo: Instagram/Cristiano) Share Get Real Madrid CF updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Iker Casillas has criticised Real Madrid's fans for their treatment of Cristiano Ronaldo. 
Despite being the club's all-time record goal scorer, Ronaldo has never been afforded the full adulation of Madrid's supporters. 
He's been jeered on and off ever since moving to the Bernabeu in 2009 but has felt the full wrath of the Madridistas this season - despite scoring 20 times in 25 appearances in all competitions. 
After misplacing a few passes at the start of Madrid's win over Real Sociedad on Sunday he was subjected to boos and responded by appearing to swear in the direction of his own fans. 
And Casillas reckons Madrid's fans expect too much of their team's star man. Ronaldo was booed at the start of Madrid's clash with Real Sociedad on Sunday but went on to score in a 3-0 win (Photo: Getty) Casillas has defended former teammate Ronaldo (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
